column4: UPDATE 2-Cablevision sues Verizon over commercial targeting FiOS
column5: NEW YORK  May 19 Cablevision Systems Corp  sued Verizon Communications Inc on Tuesday  seeking a judge's finding that its television commercial claiming Verizon's FiOS service does not solely use fiber optic cable is truthful.

column4: Cablevision sues Verizon over claims in commercial targeting FiOS
column5: NEW YORK  May 19 Cablevision Systems Corp  sued Verizon Communications Inc on Tuesday  seeking a judge's finding that a Cablevision television commercial claiming that Verizon's FiOS service does not solely use fiber optic cable is actually truthful.

column4: Wal-Mart sales miss estimates as shoppers save more  spend less
column5: Wal-Mart Stores Inc  on Tuesday joined the list of U.S. retailers reporting disappointing quarterly results  saying consumers' pocketing tax refunds and savings from cheaper gasoline had dented its sales growth. | Video

column5: * Customer visits increase in U.S. for second straight quarter

column4: UK's Asda suffers worst sales fall in over five years
column5: LONDON Asda  the British arm of U.S. retailer Wal-Mart   reported its worst quarterly sales fall in more than five years on Tuesday  but insisted its long-term strategy was the right one.

column4: Wal-Mart 1st-qtr same-store sales miss estimates
column5: May 19 Wal-Mart Stores Inc  the world's largest retailer  reported lower-than-expected U.S. same-store sales growth  sending its shares down 2 percent in premarket trading on Tuesday.

column4: BRIEF-Feitian's unit signs deal with Disney in Shanghai to use Disney characters in products
column5: * Says unit signs deal with Disney in Shanghai that allows unit to use Disney characters in its products

column4: MOVES-Societe Generale  Allianz  Deutsche Bank  TPG Capital
column5: May 19 The following financial services industry appointments were announced on Tuesday. To inform us of other job changes  email moves@thomsonreuters.com.

column4: MOVES-Wells Fargo names Rohan Kalbag head of commercial banking  Northern California
column5: May 19 Banking and financial services company Wells Fargo & Co said it named Rohan Kalbag head of commercial banking for Northern California.

column4: Whirlpool and AB InBev team up on hot-and-cold drink machine
column5: SAO PAULO Whirlpool Corp and Anheuser-Busch InBev on Tuesday started selling a countertop appliance that makes soda  juice and coffee with single-serve capsules  marking the start of a joint venture worth more than $70 million.

column4: Whirlpool and AB InBev team up on hot-and-cold drink machine
column5: SAO PAULO  May 19 Whirlpool Corp and Anheuser-Busch InBev on Tuesday started selling a countertop appliance that makes soda  juice and coffee with single-serve capsules  marking the start of a joint venture worth more than $70 million.

column4: China looks to secure 1st U.S. LNG supplies from Cheniere by 2020
column5: KUALA LUMPUR  May 19 Chinese buyers are eyeing long-term supplies of liquefied natural gas (LNG) from U.S. company Cheniere Energy  an official from the firm said on Tuesday  in what would be the first LNG deal between the world's two biggest energy users.

column4: UPDATE 1-Nyrstar agrees sale option for Peruvian mine
column5: BRUSSELS  May 19 Belgium's Nyrstar  the world's largest zinc producer  has sold an option to buy its mothballed Peruvian mine in Coricancha to Canada's Great Panther Silver Limited.

column4: Nyrstar agrees sale option for Peruvian mine
